title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Web-Based Therapy Manual Training with Multimedia Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can understand the core principles of web-based therapy manuals and explain key concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can evaluate their ability to analyze and apply therapy scenarios using multimedia tools (e.g., video role-play, animation).
Learners can design a digital transformation project for therapy manuals in teams and produce interactive content tailored to real clinical contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
